generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with multiple lanes, crosswalks, and road markings, including bicycle lane markings, which are all part of the road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the image, adjacent to the road, with a curb separating it from the road.
- building: A building is visible on the left side of the image, with scaffolding attached to its exterior.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery visible throughout the image, including on the left, right, and in the background.
- terrain: Grass and other ground vegetation are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- sky: The sky is visible in the background, above the trees and buildings.
- person: A person is visible on the left side of the image, near the sidewalk, appearing to be walking or standing.
- car: Several cars are visible in the image, including a black SUV on the left, a white classic car in the middle, and a black car further ahead.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, including one on a pole on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: Various traffic signs are visible, including a round "no entry" sign and a blue arrow sign on a pole in the middle of the image.
- pole: Multiple poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the far left side of the image, near the sidewalk.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the far left side of the image, near the sidewalk, with a person riding it.
